features.featureTitle: Replace the current background audio track used by the <audio> element in `frontend/src/components/ProposeDayPage.tsx` (currently `src="/assets/audio/propose-day-song.mp3"`) with an audio file that contains the song “Chaar Kadam” using the male-sung portion of the lyrics, stored as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/audio/`.

Add a subtle fade-in effect when music playback starts from the Play button in `frontend/src/components/ProposeDayPage.tsx`, so the audio ramps from silence to the user’s current effective volume (respecting mute/volume state and reduced-motion preference) over a short duration.
